title: Ep. - 502 - MENUDO: FOREVER YOUNG  DIRECTOR KRISTOFER RIOS AND ASH RUIZ
description:
Kristofer Rios, Co-Director of Menudo: Forever Young on HBO Max, which chronicles the band's rise to fame in the late 70s and 80s and their influence on youth and pop culture at the time. It also delves deep into the sexual abuse allegations made by members of the band against manager Edgardo Diaz.

 

Ash Ruiz discusses his experiences as a member of Menudo from 1991-1995. 

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
